sense.def: Alternative Names han xue 汗血 , sweat blood; mai yi 脈溢 , vessel overflow; ji nü 肌衄 , spontaneous muscle bleeding. Pathological Condition of bleeding from the muscle tissue without apparent external injury. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 69: 治血汗從膚腠出，神白散方 , “To cure blood sweat leaving through the dermal interstices, [use] the recipe for the ‘wondrously effective powder with [ ren zhong ] bai ’”.
